#summary SrvAuth user authentication services

= Introduction =

SrvAuth provides user authentication for the other services

= Modules =

|| *MODULE* || *ACCESS LEVEL* || *DESCRIPTION*||
|| SrvAuth\DumpUsers || SRA || Dumps registered users. ||
|| SrvAuth\Confirm || PENDING || Verifies your email. ||
|| SrvAuth\Unregister || HELPER || Unregisters an account ||
|| SrvAuth\Info || AUTHED || Returns information about a handle ||
|| SrvAuth\Promote || HELPER || Sets user services access. ||
|| SrvAuth\ReAuth || NONE || Re-logs you into services after split (INTERNAL COMMAND) ||
|| SrvAuth\WhoAmi || NONE || Gives you information about yourself, including services info ||
|| SrvAuth\Auth || NONE || Logs you into services. ||
|| SrvAuth\Whois || HELPER || Gives you information about a user ||
|| SrvAuth\ChangePass || PENDING || Changes your password. ||
|| SrvAuth\Register || NONE || Registers your account with services||
